snippet: A man armed with three knives went on a stabbing spree in the office of a technical school in a Columbus office building on Wednesday, injuring four people before being shot by a police officer.
abstract: Man armed with three knives enters Miami-Jacobs Career College in Columbus, Ohio, stabbing four people before being shot by police officer; four men, including the assailant, are in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: A man armed with three knives went on a stabbing spree in the office of a technical school in a Columbus office building on Wednesday, injuring four people before being shot by a police officer.

headline.main: Ohio: Man Shot After Stabbing 4 People in Columbus
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Man Shot After Stabbing 4 People In Columbus
